original_text: As for me, I know that my Redeemer lives. 19: A ‘redeemer’ is someone who pays another person's debts. Job uses it here as a name for God. In the New Testament, we read that Jesus paid the price for all the wrong things that we have done. I know that, in the end, he will stand on the earth. As for me, I know that my Redeemer lives. 19: A ‘redeemer’ is someone who pays another person's debts. Job uses it here as a name for God. In the New Testament, we read that Jesus paid the price for all the wrong things that we have done. I know that, in the end, he will stand on the earth. As for me, I know that my Redeemer lives. 19: A ‘redeemer’ is someone who pays another person's debts. Job uses it here as a name for God. In the New Testament, we read that Jesus paid the price for all the wrong things that we have done. I know that, in the end, he will stand on the earth. As for me, I know that my Redeemer lives.
korean_text: 내가 알기에는 나의 대속자가 살아 계시니 마침내 그가 땅 위에 서실 것이라

sentences.original_text: Job uses it here as a name for God
sentences.korean_translation: 욥은 여기서 이것을 하나님의 이름으로 사용한다

for all the wrong things that we have done

sentences.korean_translation: 그가 땅 위에 서실 것임을 안다
